attributes.action: Make Liam Mcleod the new presenter on ScotSport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If ScotSport is to be saved as the nations number one sports programme, we must have BBC Radio Scotland personality Liam Mcleod installed as the main host by the start of the 2007/2008 season.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
